name: My Life in Laria (Early Alpha Demo)
name_original: My Life in Laria (Early Alpha Demo)
description:
Very short alpha demo for My Life in Laria.

Tin's life is no normal one. Embark on her quest to (?) where you will (?) and (?)

What? Huh. Guess I'm not telling you much. Just try keep that deathcount low

Controls:

WASD- Move and jump

IJKL or arrow keys- Move target. Aiming you're target at an enemy will automatically kill them.

Shift(hold)- Skateboard. Skateboarding will speed you up, but you will not be able to jump as high and it takes longer to stop moving.

Space- Progress through dialogue/cutscenes

This a very early and buggy version of the game. If there are any problems please report them to me. This is a very short demo

Find me on twitter @ZeldaBoi2

Music by @DimitriyDzyuba and me

FULL GAME WILL NOT BE FREE
